languages.text:
{n}Ксенос наигранно кланяется, не отрывая взгляда от лица Назракея.{/n}
"Архонт, упрек твой вправду справедлив.
Мелодии судьбы сплелись чудно,
Меня опутав и пленив силком, —
Заслушавшись, я не сдержал улыбки.
Настало время тени сгинуть прочь:
Туда, где занавес воспрять готов,
Смех без начала простирает зов".

traits.locale_text:
{n}Ксенос наигранно кланяется, не отрывая взгляда от лица Назракея.{/n}
"Архонт, упрек твой вправду справедлив.

Туда, где занавес воспрять готов,
Смех без начала простирает зов".
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin

languages.text:
{n}The xenos sweeps into a theatrical bow without taking his eyes off Nazrakhei's face.{/n}
"You, Archon, speak a just rebuke, in truth,
Fate's melodies in snarls fantastic have
Entrapped me here, and when I heard them play
I could not keep my lips from grinning wide.
Here comes the hour for shadows to retreat:
To where the curtain waits to rise, the laugh
With no beginning now sends forth the call."

languages.text:
{n}异形朝纳札骸戏剧性地鞠了一躬，他的目光并没有离开纳札骸的脸。{/n}
“执政官，你的责备言之凿凿。
将我困于此处的力量，
是命运的旋律与咆哮。
每当我听到它的声音，
便无法掩饰心中窃笑。
阴影谢幕的时刻已至，
在幕布等待升起之时。
不羁的笑声无休无始，
它的呼唤已无法遏止。”
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos sweeps into a theatrical bow without taking his eyes off Nazrakhei's face.{/n}
"You, Archon, speak a just rebuke, in truth,
Fate's melodies in snarls fantastic have

Here comes the hour for shadows to retreat:
To where the curtain waits to rise, the laugh
With no beginning now sends forth the call."

traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin

languages.text:
{n}異種族はナズラクヘイの顔を見つめたまま、芝居ががったお辞儀をする。{/n}
「アーコン、君は確かに正論ばかり
運命の旋律は幻想的で
魅了された僕はここに囚われた
その調べを聞くや否や、唇の笑みを抑えられない
今こそ影が退くべき時
幕が上がるのを待つ場所で
始まりのない笑いが今、呼びかける」
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos sweeps into a theatrical bow without taking his eyes off Nazrakhei's face.{/n}
"You, Archon, speak a just rebuke, in truth,
Fate's melodies in snarls fantastic have

Here comes the hour for shadows to retreat:
To where the curtain waits to rise, the laugh
With no beginning now sends forth the call."

traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin

languages.text:
{n}El xenos realiza una reverencia teatral sin apartar la mirada del rostro de Nazrakhei.{/n}
«Arconte, tu reproche es ciertamente merecido:
las melodías del destino masculladas con tino
me atraparon aquí, y al oír su fantástico susurro
no logré que mis labios se mantuvieran mudos.
Llega el momento de que las sombras se retiren
adonde el telón aguarda la hora acordada:
la risa sin comienzo envía su llamada».
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos sweeps into a theatrical bow without taking his eyes off Nazrakhei's face.{/n}
"You, Archon, speak a just rebuke, in truth,
Fate's melodies in snarls fantastic have

I could not keep my lips from grinning wide.
Here comes the hour for shadows to retreat:
To where the curtain waits to rise, the laugh
With no beginning now sends forth the call."

traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin

languages.text:
{n}Le xénos fait une révérence théâtrale sans pour autant détacher son regard du visage de Nazrakhei.{/n}
« Votre reproche, Archonte, est parfaitement justifié
Les mélodies du destin superbement entremêlées
M'ont attiré ici et quand elles se sont jouées,
Un sourire béat sur mes lèvres s'est formé.
À présent, il est temps pour les ombres de se retirer.
Là où le rideau attend d'être levé,
Le rire sans début commence à appeler. »
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos sweeps into a theatrical bow without taking his eyes off Nazrakhei's face.{/n}
"You, Archon, speak a just rebuke, in truth,
Fate's melodies in snarls fantastic have

Here comes the hour for shadows to retreat:
To where the curtain waits to rise, the laugh
With no beginning now sends forth the call."

languages.text:
{n}Der Xenos verbeugt sich theatralisch, ohne den Blick von Nazrakheis Gesicht abzuwenden.{/n}
"Archon, Euer Tadel ist berechtigt, denn wahrlich,
des Schicksals Melodien in fantastischen Kapriolen
halten mich hier fest, und als ich sie erklingen hörte,
konnte ich ein breites Grinsen nicht unterdrücken.
Es naht die Stunde des Rückzugs der Schatten:
Der Vorhang will sich heben, das Gelächter
ohne Anfang sendet itzo seinen Ruf."
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos sweeps into a theatrical bow without taking his eyes off Nazrakhei's face.{/n}
"You, Archon, speak a just rebuke, in truth,

languages.text:
{n}Zeno, gözlerini Nazrakhei'in yüzünden ayırmadan, abartılı bir şekilde eğiliyor.{/n}
"Sen! Arkon, dile getirdiğin adil bir sitem,
Kaderin melodilerinin olağanüstü hırıltıları
Beni buraya tıktılar, çalışını dinledim onların
Dudaklarım kocaman gülümsedi, engelleyemedim.
Böylece gölgelerin çekilme saati gelir:
Perdelerin kalkmak için beklediği yere,
Gülüşün öncesinde verir haberi."
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos sweeps into a theatrical bow without taking his eyes off Nazrakhei's face.{/n}
"You, Archon, speak a just rebuke, in truth,
Fate's melodies in snarls fantastic have
Entrapped me here, and when I heard them play
I could not keep my lips from grinning wide.
Here comes the hour for shadows to retreat:
To where the curtain waits to rise, the laugh
With no beginning now sends forth the call."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Zeno, gözlerini Nazrakhei'in yüzünden ayırmadan, tiyatral bir şekilde eğiliyor.{/n}
"Sen, Arkon, dile getirdiğin adil bir sitem,
Kaderin melodilerinin olağanüstü hırıltıları
Beni buraya tıktılar ve onların çalışını dinledim
Dudaklarım kocaman gülümsedi, engelleyemedim.
Gölgelerin çekilme saati gelir böylece:
Perdelerin kalkmak için beklediği yere, gülüşün
Başlangıcı olmayan haber gönderir, çağırır."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin
